thread.title: Russian denials of British attack "increasingly absurd," Johnson says

title: Russian denials of British attack "increasingly absurd," Johnson says
text:
Russian denials of British attack "increasingly absurd," Johnson says 6:27pm IST - 00:48 
''Increasingly absurd'' is how British Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson describes Russian denials of recent British attack. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
